org.jhove2.core.app
Class AbstractApplication

java.lang.Object
  org.jhove2.core.reportable.AbstractReportable
      org.jhove2.module.AbstractModule
          org.jhove2.core.app.AbstractApplication
All Implemented Interfaces:
Application, Reportable, Module
Direct Known Subclasses:
JHOVE2CommandLine
@Persistent
public abstract class AbstractApplication
extends AbstractModule
implements Application

Abstract application based on the JHOVE2 framework .

Author:
mstrong, slabrams, smorrissey

Constructor Detail

AbstractApplication

public AbstractApplication(String version,
                           String release,
                           String rights,
                           Module.Scope scope,
                           ApplicationModuleAccessor applicationModuleAccessor)
                    throws JHOVE2Exception
Instantiate a new AbstractApplication.

Parameters:
version - Application version identifier in three-part form: "M.N.P"
release - Application release date in ISO 8601 format: "YYYY-MM-DD"
rights - Application rights statement
scope - Application scope: generic or specific
applicationModuleAccessor - persistence access manager
Throws:
JHOVE2Exception - if Displayer cannot be initialized
